name: Leviton Double Rocker Switch - Decora Collection
description: Leviton's award-winning line of designer style devices enhance every interior from traditional to contemporary. They easily replaces standard devices throughout your home and add the perfect finishing touch. The Decora offering includes switches, outlets, GFCIs, lighting controls, home automation, multi-room audio/video products, fan speed controls and wall plates.Space saving design fits multiple devices in a single wall box2 switches control two separate fixturesSingle pole controls light(s) from one locationUse with Decora wall plate
